alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Otter Tail County through 530 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a a cluster of strong thunderstorms to the west and northwest of Fergus Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Ottertail Lake, Battle Lake, Henning, Ottertail, Underwood and Dalton. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 48 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail
